explains: n. 联邦政府，联邦；联合会；结成联邦（或联盟）

sentences.en: In the future we envision a federation of companies.
sentences.cn: 我们设想将来会有公司联盟。

sentences.en: The World Chess Federation has affiliates in around 120 countries.
sentences.cn: 世界象棋联盟在大约一百二十个国家内设有分支机构。

sentences.en: By 492 votes to 391, the federation voted to maintain the status quo.
sentences.cn: 联盟以492票对391票投票决定维持现状。
